about_the_game:
Blacktop Hoops is the ultimate arcade VR basketball game with intuitive controls which allow players to pull off insane dribble combos, break ankles, sink impressive shots, and unleash jaw-dropping dunks to defeat opponents in epic matches.

Face off against streetball legends in single player with realistic AI, hoop casually in multiplayer, or climb the ranks with your crew in competitive ranked matches. With dozens of fresh fits to unlock, you can show off your unique style on the court. Blacktop Hoops is a perfect hybrid of arcade and simulation, letting you experience fast-paced authentic streetball in virtual reality.

The Beta is out biggest update yet, featuring our new:

  • Rising Legends Pack: New challengers have arrived in our Rising Legends Pack! Face off against 5 new legends 1vs1 with their own signature playstyles. Show off with exclusive customization features including emotes, custom courts, and dunk explosions. ONLY available with purchase of the Rising Legends Pack. Don't miss out!
  • Revamped AI System: Our revamped AI system pits you against the most immersive basketball characters in VR with hundreds of animations for more challenging gameplay.
  • Ranked Division & Badges: Unlock new divisions and competitive badges as you progress to become the best VR baller in the world.
  • 4vs4 Full Court: Bring the whole crew in fast-paced 4vs4 full-court matches in Unranked or Competitive modes.
  • Game Modes : Hoop your way. Go full sweat and grind the leaderboards in Competitive, hone your skills in VS AI, play some casual matches in Casual public parks, or hoop just with friends in Private Parks.

    - VS AI: Face off against the streetball legends with signature playstyles in epic 1-on-1 matches.
    - Casual (Public Parks): Play casual pick-up games with friends and chill in public parks.
    - Competitive (Ranked Matchmaking) Climb the ranks and compete for the top spot on the leaderboards with our new competitive matchmaking. Go solo or grab your squad with challenging matchups against players of similar ability and become the Greatest of All Time.
    - Private (Private Parks): Create or join private parks and play together with friends in private lobbies.

  • Friends Lists: Add your friends to your friends list and hoop together casually or at your own private court.
  • Party Matchmaking: Team up with your crew with our new party system, rank up new competitive ranks, and dominate the competition.
  • Rankings, Leaderboards, & Stats: Show off your competitive rankings and individual stats across players from across the globe or see all of your historical stats across all game modes.
  • Dribble, Shoot, Dunk Mechanics: Show off with the most buttery-smooth handling mechanics in VR. Feel the rim rattle with every dunk, break ankles with our groundbreaking dribbling system, and knock down threes with intuitive shooting mechanics. Easy to learn but hard to master.
  • 3 Unique Environments: Travel the streets playing streetball and meet new hoopers on fresh courts inspired by real-world locations including Los Angeles, Oakland, and New York.
  • Customization: Flex on the competition with your cleanest fits with dozens of cosmetics including tanks, shorts, kicks, and more!
  • Challenges: Complete Daily and Weekly Challenges and achievements to level up and unlock high-level cosmetics.
  • Currency: Blacktop Credits are in-game currency that can be spent in Blacktop Hoops. You can purchase new customization items like Hats, Tops, Bottoms, Balls, and the latest season's Battle Pack!
  • Shop: Gear up with the freshest drip with our new digital shop. Browse through dozens of apparel, kicks, and accessories to unlock or purchase designs for your perfect fit.
  • Spectator Mode: Capture that slam dunk or buzzer-beating shot from any angle with spectator mode.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better.
  • VR Support: Oculus PC or OpenXR

short_description: Become a legend in Blacktop Hoops, the ultimate arcade VR basketball game which allows players to pull off insane dribble combos, break ankles, sink impressive shots, and unleash jaw-dropping dunks to defeat real-world players or AI opponents.
